LanguageData.JRWZalmoxesReconstruct.label: Zalmoxes
LanguageData.JRWZalmoxesReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #05541-1899 [ZALMOXES ROBUSTUS] CODENAME: HERODOTUS >532
A small ornithopod with a bright orange hide that almost sparkles. They are quick and highly strung but generally quite peaceful. Their leather has become quite sought after within certain tribes.
LanguageData.JRWZalmoxesReconstruct.tools.head.label: head
